trans-unit.source: Represents a displacement in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] space.
A <xref:System.Windows.Point> represents a fixed position, but a Vector represents a direction and a magnitude (for example, velocity or acceleration).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Point>表示固定的位置，但一方向及範圍 （例如，速度或加速） 向量代表。</xref:System.Windows.Point>

trans-unit.source: Thus, the endpoints of a line segment are points but their difference is a vector; that is, the direction and length of that line segment.
trans-unit.target: 因此，直線線段的結束點，但是差異向量。也就是說的方向和長度的行區段。

trans-unit.source: In XAML, the delimiter between the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> values of a Vector can be either a comma or a space.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中、 之間的分隔符號<xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>向量的值可以是逗號或空格。</xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character.
trans-unit.target: 做為十進位的分隔符號，而不是句號字元，某些文化特性可能會使用逗號字元。

trans-unit.source: XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter.
trans-unit.target: XAML 處理而異的文化特性為 EN-US，在大部分的 XAML 處理器實作中，預設值，並預期期限設為十進位的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a Vector in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a Vector attribute value into the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> components.
trans-unit.target: 您應該避免使用逗號字元做為小數分隔符號如果在 XAML 中，指定的向量，將字串類型轉換的向量屬性值衝突，因為<xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>元件。</xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` -or- ``` ## XAML Values *x* The vector's X component.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` -or- ``` # # XAML 值*x*向量的 X 元件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> property.
*y* The vector's Y component.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>結構。

The <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y*>-offset of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>.
Translates the specified point by the specified vector and returns the resulting point.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的點轉譯指定的向量，並傳回產生的點。

trans-unit.source: The amount to translate the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 要轉譯的指定的點的數量。

The result of translating point by vector.

The second vector to add.
The sum of vector1 and vector2.
Retrieves the angle, expressed in degrees, between the two specified vectors.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的角度，以度為單位，介於兩個指定向量來表示。

trans-unit.source: The first vector to evaluate.
The second vector to evaluate.
The angle, in degrees, between vector1 and vector2.
trans-unit.target: 角度，以度為單位，介於 vector1 和 vector2 。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the cross product of two vectors.
trans-unit.target: 計算兩個向量的交叉乘積。

trans-unit.source: The first vector to evaluate.
The second vector to evaluate.
The cross product of vector1 and vector2.
The following formula is used to calculate the cross product: `(Vector1.X * Vector2.Y) - (Vector1.Y * Vector2.X)`
trans-unit.target: 下列公式用來計算交叉乘積︰`(Vector1.X * Vector2.Y) - (Vector1.Y * Vector2.X)`

trans-unit.source: Calculates the determinant of two vectors.
trans-unit.target: 計算兩個向量的行列式。

trans-unit.source: The first vector to evaluate.
The second vector to evaluate.
The determinant of vector1 and vector2.
Divides the specified vector by the specified scalar and returns the result as a <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的向量除以指定的純量，並傳回結果做為<xref href="System.Windows.Vector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The vector structure to divide.
The amount by which `vector` is divided.
The result of dividing vector by scalar.

Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is a <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> structure and, if it is, whether it has the same <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X*> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y*> values as this vector.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref:System.Object>是<xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>架構，如果是，是否有相同<> *> 和<> *> 與此向量的值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A vector's <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> properties are described using <xref:System.Double> values.

Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為值<xref:System.Double>上它，比較兩個執行算術運算時可能會遺失有效位數<xref:System.Windows.Vector>邏輯上相等的結構可能會失敗。</xref:System.Windows.Vector> </xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The vector to compare.
if o is a and has the same and values as this vector; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 o 是和具有相同的<> *> 和<> *> 值做為此向量中; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Compares two vectors for equality.

Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Double> structures that are logically equal might fail.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of this vector.
The length of a vector is sometimes referred to as the magnitude.
trans-unit.target: 向量的長度有時稱為大小。

trans-unit.source: The length of this vector.
Gets the square of the length of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個向量的長度平方。

trans-unit.source: The length of a vector is sometimes referred to as its magnitude.
trans-unit.target: 向量的長度有時稱為它的大小。

trans-unit.source: The vector structure to transform.
The transformation to apply to `vector`.
The result of transforming vector by matrix.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的結果 vector 由 matrix 。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the dot product of the two specified vectors and returns the result as a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 計算兩個指定向量的內積，並傳回結果做<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The first vector to multiply.
The second vector structure to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的第二個向量結構。

trans-unit.source: A containing the scalar dot product of vector1 and vector2, which is calculated using the following formula: `(vector1.X * vector2.X) + (vector1.Y * vector2.Y)`
trans-unit.target: A包含純量積 vector1 和 vector2 ，這使用下列公式來計算︰ `(vector1.X * vector2.X) + (vector1.Y * vector2.Y)`

trans-unit.source: Negates this vector.
The vector has the same magnitude as before, but its direction is now opposite.
trans-unit.target: 向量的大小和之前一樣，但現在是相反的方向。

trans-unit.source: Normalizes this vector.
A normalized vector maintains its direction but its <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A> becomes 1.
trans-unit.target: 已正規化的向量會維護其方向，但其<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>變成 1。</xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting vector is often called a unit vector.
trans-unit.target: 產生的向量通常稱為單位向量。

trans-unit.source: A vector is normalized by dividing the vector by its own <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 相除的向量自己<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>都被正規化的向量
